thread.title: Rare dinosaur find prompts call for volunteer palaeontologists

title: Rare dinosaur find prompts call for volunteer palaeontologists
text:
Rare dinosaur find prompts call for volunteer palaeontologists 10:58am GMT - 01:36 
Scientists examining a rare dinosaur skeleton are appealing to the public for help excavating it and offering to train them in the art of fossil preparation as Stuart McDill reports.   
Scientists examining a rare dinosaur skeleton are appealing to the public for help excavating it and offering to train them in the art of fossil preparation as Stuart McDill reports.  //reut.rs/2CN2cm0
